commons-vfs_cd37b90.message:
Internal Javadoc related to same issue as [VFS-667]: org.apache.commons.vfs2.provider.res.ResourceFileProvider.findFile(FileObject, String, FileSystemOptions) should throw a org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException instead of a NPE when the class loader is null.
